page.title: 03PROJECT WEEK
page.content:
Project Week.
The last week of the Summer term at Axminster school is called Project week. During this week the schools normal time table is suspended and pupils and staff have an opportunity to take part in a varity of activities. This year the projects varied from a seven day holiday in Holland to sailing on the Exe.The projects try to give pupils an opportunity to take part in some activity that would normally not be possible. For many pupils project week represents their only summer holiday and for many it is the first time that they will have spent time away from home.
